title: Give Taric a new skin !

embed.description: Trivia Taric was designed by Brackhar., Taric is voiced by Dennis Collins Johnson, who also voices Gangplank and Heimerdinger., Taric's name most likely originates from the Arabian name "طارق/Tariq", which means "The striker." A commonly used Quranic idiom of tariq also relates it to brilliant stars, furthering its connection to him as a character.

body:
It's nearly been 4 years since Taric has gotten a new skin. I'd like to see if anyone had an ideas for a Taric skin. Using Pink Taric is always fun walking around in his pink ugg-boots, but I'd like to see another skin instead of having a Debonair Galio or an Archduke Nasus whos last skins were in 2012 and 2013.

Thanks :)

replies.body: he's getting a rework first, there's no point in making a skin for a polygon from 2009
But you know, with a hammer.
